title: Maybe don't put a Ring on it?
description:
Amazon’s Ring has some safety issues. How secure are these home security systems?

Featured Guests
@Jessica_Holley
@ranimolla

LINKS:
Family says hackers accessed a Ring camera in their 8-year-old daughter’s room
 
How Amazon’s Ring is creating a surveillance network with video doorbells

The rise of fear-based social media like Nextdoor, Citizen, and now Amazon’s Neighbors

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
